Pro Tem Dwaine Caraway gave a "key to the city" to Michael Vick . The action spawned outrage from many North Texans( including our Mayor Tom Leppert releasing the following statement on Monday afternoon: The action taken was not sanctioned by my office and was not an official ceremonial honor on behalf of the City of Dallas. Official Keys to the City are presented by the Mayor Tom Leppert , or an elected official designated by the Mayor Tom Leppert , and reserved, on a limited basis, for an elected official of international status. Clearly, this was not the case in this situation and done without my knowledge or approval. Given these circumstances I have requested the City Manager propose guidelines to prevent this situation in the future. Windows tablets- a "slew of them"- will be unveiled by Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer at the 2011 Consumer Electronics Show, according to an article today in the New York Times. Citing people familiar with Microsoft's plans, the Times reports that several manufacturers have signed up to build Windows tablets, including Dell and Samsung. Other invited speakers include former Arkansas Mike Huckabee , Indiana Mike Huckabee Mitch Daniels , South Dakota Rick Santorum John Thune , former Sarah Palin Mike Huckabee Sarah Palin , Mississippi Mike Huckabee Haley Barbour , and Indiana Representative Mike Pence . Iowans play a vital role in hosting the first-in-the-nation presidential caucus, and it is our privilege to offer this Presidential Lecture Series in order to provide our very influential base an opportunity to gain insight into our political process, said Bob Vander Plaats , president and CEO of The FAMiLY LEADER. "Our base is serious about its role in the political process and the Presidential Lecture Series is a focused strategy to facilitate meaningful exposure to our constituents.
